main event: Civilian and military radar detected an unidentified object near Minot AFB, with visual confirmation by pilots.
interesting points: The object was tracked at around 7,000 ft and followed a similar path to the radar target., It seemed to disappear from radar scope after moving inbound toward the station., The object was observed for approximately 5 to 9 minutes., The weather conditions at the time were clear with no visibility restrictions., The possibility of equipment malfunction was ruled out as the target was seen both visually and on radar.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object tracked by radar
witness description: civilian pilots and military personnel monitoring radar
